meanings.definition: A particular form or variant of something.
meanings.sent1: I prefer the older versioned of the software.
meanings.sent2: The latest versioned of the book includes new illustrations.
meanings.sent3: The museum displayed an ancient versioned of the artifact.
meanings.sent4: Her style is like a modern versioned of classic fashion.
meanings.sent5: The vintage car was a unique versioned of automotive history.

meanings.definition: To create different versions of something.
meanings.sent1: She versioned the document to include the latest changes.
meanings.sent2: The team versioned the project to test various designs.
meanings.sent3: He versioned the recipe to add a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: The artist versioned the painting to explore new techniques.
meanings.sent5: They versioned the song to create a fresh sound.
